show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: Global, Out-Of-Control Demographics
content:
There is much to be learned about this from Aldous Huxley and we hear several quotes from his ‘Brave New World… (Revisited)’.
Many awkward questions, not many answers.
An in-depth look at population statistics and the true motives behind wars.
A look at ‘Abenomics’ (the economics of the Japanese Prime Minister, Shinzo Abe).
More on GDP.
The inability of average citizens to prevail when it comes to public policy.
Car buying in America and its corresponding auto loan industry (currently sporting the ever-popular ‘sub-prime’ version).
Another catastrophe waiting to happen, just like the sub-prime lending equivalent with the housing market.
Will we never learn?
